column4: Hey, I already have ubuntu installed, and I want to install Kubuntu, but what will happen at startup? Will there be 2 GRUB's, will Kubuntu be on the OS selector list? what will happen?
No need, it comes already installed
ubuntu and kubuntu are the same OS, one uses gnome one uses kde, so if you have ubuntu installed, just install kubuntu-desktop
no its a command linke argument
I am on winodws now, but I will switch in 1 sec, all I have to do is type in 1 command line, and I will have KDE on my ubuntu?
in command line you will get this
